text: Alaŋ 5.7 Lu 21.34-36, Lom 13.13, Ef 5.14 igɨlalu uami. Hulaŋ ani hɨsɨvavɨlalɨ agɨlaŋ hɨfɨlɨ hɨvɨ ani hɨsɨvavɨlalɨ uami. Hulaŋ hɨjɨŋalaŋala avɨli vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ nana ula ula livaliva aba aba hɨdavɨlalɨ agɨlaŋ uami. Nɨbɨlaŋ hɨfɨlɨ hɨvɨ avɨli vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ nana hɨjɨŋalaŋala ula ula livaliva aba aba hɨdavɨlalɨ uami.
